unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Probability of First Win: Dice
question_text: Suppose two fair dice are rolled. If both dice show the same number (called a "double"), the player wins $\$10$ . If they do not, the player loses $\$2$ . If a player plays this game once every day for one week, what is the probability she gets her first "double" on or before the seventh day of the week?
